"A.P.241/11/23 10:00": "A person who looks like Xion, huh..."
"Could that be how the Photoner who originally made contact with Xion looked?"
"There aren't any records remaining from back then so the best I can do is guess, but given the situation it seems likely."
"And she's named Clarissa too... Second, did you ever hear Clarissa speak to you?"
"Umm... I vaguely remember hearing it but... That was Xion's voice."
"I see... It was already Xion's voice when I held it too."
"It may have been named 'Clarissa', but I sure never felt any presence other than Xion's."
"That said... the Ivory Staff Clarissa clearly differs from the other Genesis Weapons."
"So the records from back then..."
"Were completely erased by Xion. With no way to recover them, though... I think she was trying to tell us it isn't necessary to..."
"Back to matters at hand, with things calming down in Omega we need to come up with our next move."
"There's still two countries left. Their names were Es-Ars and Epic, I believe?"
"They seem to be more open to communications than Verun was at least, hopefully we can settle things peacefully."
"Well, that's up to Harriet now. Until anything major happens, our Guardian here will get to have some time to relax."
"We have a big problem, partner! Yuki-nee's been kidnapped!"
"Kidnapped is a pretty harsh term. What exactly happened, Afin?"
"I don't really have any idea what happened either but... We were talking and some strange pattern suddenly appeared at her feet, and she just... vanished!"
"Aurora vanished with her too... Where have they been taken?!"
"Understood, we'll look into it right away. Afin, you comb the ship for them and report back as soon as you find anything out."
"I... Alright."
"Yucreta and Aurora, kidnapped? ...But, who would take them, how'd they even manage it, and... why?"
"Xiao, we have an emergency situation."
"Brigitta? It must be serious if an operator is contacting me directly."
"Moments ago, Aika of the Intelligence Department suddenly vanished from my sensors."
"...Suddenly? Please elaborate."
"I was in the middle of navigating for her when her signal was abruptly cut."
"I saved the logs and surrounding parameter data but... I've never seen anything like this before."
"Understood, we'll begin looking for her right away. In the meantime, can you contact the Intelligence Department for me?"
"Also, if you get any additional reports of a similar nature, please forward them to me immediately."
"Roger that. Do you... think Aika will be alright?"
"She'll be okay. The girl managed to come back after becoming a Dark Falz after all."
"It's not just Yucreta, but Aika's missing as well...?"
"Oh, I got through. Sorry <%me>, can I have a sec?"
"Did something happen?"
"Sounds like more bad news..."
" Yeah, basically. You could call it bad news for certain."
"I've just received word that an Ether-attuned individual has suddenly vanished from Earth."
"An Ether-attuned individual... You don't mean Hitsugi or Kohri, do you?"
"Nah, they're not anyone that you've ever met, Xiera. Her name is Rina Izumi... I don't suppose you've noticed anything strange on your side?"
"Rina Izumi... She's the one from Casra's report, the girl from Earth who became [Apprentice]'s host."
"I'm sorry to say we haven't received any reports about her at all on this side, Enga."
"We'll begin searching right away of course, but in the meantime can you keep looking out on the Earth side?"
"Yeah, I was planning to from the start. Something about this smells real suspect to me..."
"With this, the missing have risen to Yucreta, Aurora, Aika... And the girl from Earth, Rina Izumi."
"And the common trait they all share is..."
"They've all experienced being Dark Falz..."
"They were all hosts for [Apprentice]."
"Correct. They were each a host for Dark Falz [Apprentice] at one point."
"However there hasn't been any change on Lillipa. [Apprentice] has been perfectly calm on this side..."
"Which would mean... Something happened in Omega, then..."
"But, if it's messing things up on this side... Something about it feels different this time."
"<%me>, Xiera. I want you two to investigate, but please be careful."
